name: Ivysaur

evolution.description: Ivysaur can evolve into Venusaur at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Seed Pokémon. The bud on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.
